Desc.entry: Activity Sheffield's headline target is to achieve a 1% year-on-year increase in the city's activity levels i.e. the number of adults achieving 5 x 30 minutes of at least moderate activity each week and the number of young people achieving an hour a day of at least moderate activity each week. Has as a top priority to improve health through encouraging regular physical activity. However also aims to support those people who want to achieve sporting success, either through sports programmes or major sports events. Provides a range of sessions including: cheerleading, street dance, basketball, snooker, aerobics and boxing, as well as activities for mature adults such as low impact aerobics, jogging and multisports.
